sections.description: An ode to vibrant, plant-forward Indian flavors â€” where vegetables, grains, and paneer take center stage in dishes that are colorful, nourishing, and elegantly spiced.

menu_items.name: Paneer Thecha Tikkas
menu_items.description: Spiced paneer cubes marinated in a fiery green chiliâ€“peanut thecha and grilled to smoky perfection â€” bold, creamy, and irresistibly flavorful.
menu_items.plating: Mini skewers on a wooden board with green thecha dip and microgreen garnish.

menu_items.name: Mini-Samosa Chaat Cups
menu_items.description: Crispy mini samosas topped with tangy chutneys, spiced yogurt, and fresh sev â€” a playful explosion of textures and flavors in every bite.
menu_items.plating: Served in mini cups layered with chutneys and yogurt, topped with sev and micro herbs.

menu_items.name: Avocado Chaat Cups
menu_items.description: Creamy avocado tossed with spiced chickpeas, pomegranate, and tamarind drizzle â€” a fresh, fusion twist on Indian street chaat.
menu_items.plating: Mini cups topped with pomegranate pearls and edible petals.

menu_items.name: Pav Bhaji Dippers (with Focaccia Bread)
menu_items.description: Mumbaiâ€™s iconic street favorite â€” spiced vegetable mash served warm with bite-sized focaccia dippers for a cozy, flavor-packed experience.
menu_items.plating: Mini bowls with toasted focaccia bites, butter swirls, and coriander garnish.

menu_items.name: Dabeli Platter
menu_items.description: Kutch-style spiced potato filling layered with chutneys, pomegranate, and roasted peanuts â€” a sweet, tangy, crunchy street classic reimagined.
menu_items.plating: Open-face mini buns garnished with sev and pomegranate jewels.

menu_items.name: Maggi Reimagined
menu_items.description: A playful twist on everyoneâ€™s favorite comfort food â€” chilled noodle salad tossed in spiced peanut dressing with herbs, veggies, and nostalgia.
menu_items.plating: Mini noodle nests topped with crushed peanuts and edible flowers.

menu_items.name: Bengali-Style Veg Cutlets
menu_items.description: Vibrant beetroot, potato, and pea patties with playful bursts of peanuts and raisins â€” crisp outside, soft within, and bursting with flavor.
menu_items.plating: Mini tasting spoons over green chutney, garnished with microgreens.

menu_items.name: Hari Bhari Biryani
menu_items.description: Basmati rice with spinach, herbs, and vegetables cooked in aromatic spices â€” green, fragrant, and full of flavor.
menu_items.plating: Mini earthen pots topped with fried onions and mint.

menu_items.name: Baby Naan with Achari Paneer
menu_items.description: Mini naan topped with pickled-spice paneer, onions, and yogurt-mint drizzle â€” a bite-sized North Indian favorite.
menu_items.plating: Overlapping mini naans with pink onions and coriander garnish.

menu_items.name: Matar Ki Chaat (Ghugni)
menu_items.description: Spiced vatana (white peas) simmered in tamarind gravy and topped with onions, chutneys, and sev â€” hearty and comforting.
menu_items.plating: Warm in clay or copper cups with chutneys and fresh cilantro.

menu_items.name: Neer Dosa with Mushroom Ghee Roast
menu_items.description: Delicate rice crÃªpes paired with slow-roasted mushroom masala in ghee and Mangalorean spices â€” earthy and indulgent.
menu_items.plating: Rolled dosas beside mushroom masala, garnished with curry leaves.

menu_items.name: Paneer Kofte Biryani
menu_items.description: Saffron basmati layered with golden paneer koftas in a spiced gravy â€” rich, hearty, and deeply satisfying.
menu_items.plating: Mini copper bowls topped with fried onions and mint.

sections.description: A curated collection of bold, flavor-packed seafood, poultry, and meat dishes â€” each crafted with precision, layered spices, and a touch of indulgence.

menu_items.name: Kolhapuri Shrimp Cocktail
menu_items.description: Juicy shrimp tossed in fiery Kolhapuri spices and served chilled with kokum-spiced cocktail sauce â€” a coastal twist on a classic.
menu_items.plating: Mini cocktail glasses topped with shrimp and micro cilantro.

menu_items.name: Rava Fish Bites
menu_items.description: Tender fish cubes marinated in South Indian spices and coated in crunchy semolina (rava), pan-seared to golden perfection.
menu_items.plating: Banana-leaf squares or skewers accented with lemon wedges and crispy curry leaves.

menu_items.name: Lemon Chicken Skewers
menu_items.description: Grilled chicken marinated in mild Indian spices and brushed with lemon-butter glaze â€” tender, fragrant, and full of sunshine.
menu_items.plating: Mini bamboo skewers over lemon slices and herbs.

menu_items.name: Chingri Chop
menu_items.description: Kolkata-style prawn croquettes blended with ginger, onions, and Bengali spices â€” crisp, aromatic, and bursting with coastal flavor.
menu_items.plating: Mini tasting spoons with kasundi mustard, garnished with fried curry leaves.

menu_items.name: Fish Paturi with Ghee Bhaath
menu_items.description: Fish marinated with mustard and coconut, steamed in banana leaves, and paired with fragrant ghee rice â€” a coastal Bengali delicacy.
menu_items.plating: Mini banana-leaf parcels over rice, garnished with coriander.

menu_items.name: Neer Dosa with Chicken Ghee Roast
menu_items.description: Tender chicken roasted in Mangalorean spices and ghee, paired with soft neer dosas for a perfect spice-and-butter balance.
menu_items.plating: Rolled dosas beside chicken roast with fried curry leaves.

menu_items.name: Grilled Goat Chops
menu_items.description: Goat chops marinated in Indian spices and grilled to perfection with a touch of spiced ghee and lime.
menu_items.plating: Mini portions over mint-yogurt chutney with pickled onions.

menu_items.name: Chicken / Mutton Kofte Biryani
menu_items.description: Spiced meatballs simmered in saffron gravy and layered with basmati rice â€” warm, rich, and celebratory.
menu_items.plating: Mini biryani pots topped with onions, mint, and saffron.

sections.description: A sweet symphony of heritage and innovation â€” where Indian nostalgia meets modern indulgence.

menu_items.name: Kheer BrÃ»lÃ©e
menu_items.description: Creamy rice pudding infused with cardamom, finished with a caramelized sugar crust â€” the perfect East-meets-West finale.
menu_items.plating: Mini brÃ»lÃ©e cups topped with pistachio crumble.

menu_items.name: Ras Malai Leches
menu_items.description: Soft paneer dumplings soaked in a saffron-infused three-milk reduction â€” a luscious fusion of Ras Malai and Tres Leches.
menu_items.plating: Mini glass cups with delicate rose petal garnish.

menu_items.name: Chocolate Mousse Cups
menu_items.description: Silky dark chocolate mousse with subtle notes of cardamom and clove â€” an elevated twist on a classic favorite.
menu_items.plating: Mini glass cups topped with whipped cream rosettes and edible gold flakes.

menu_items.name: Bhapa Doi (Indian Cheesecake)
menu_items.description: A steamed yogurt cheesecake â€” creamy, tangy, and delicately sweetened â€” a Bengali classic reborn in modern form.
menu_items.plating: Mini ramekins or bite-sized squares topped with saffron threads and dried rose petals.

menu_items.name: Gulab Jamun Ice Cream
menu_items.description: Velvety ice cream with chunks of gulab jamun folded in â€” nostalgia in every creamy bite.
menu_items.plating: Individual scoops in mini bowls with rose syrup drizzle and gold dust.

menu_items.name: Shrikhand Cannoli
menu_items.description: Crispy cannoli shells filled with saffron-cardamom shrikhand cream â€” crunchy, creamy, and joyfully unexpected.
menu_items.plating: Bite-sized rolls dusted with powdered sugar, garnished with candied orange peel and pistachio crumbles.

sections.description: Light, cooling, and beautifully spiced â€” crafted to complement your grazing experience.

menu_items.name: Kokum Fizz
menu_items.description: A tangy-sweet mocktail with kokum syrup, mint, and sparkling water â€” a refreshing tropical twist.
menu_items.plating: Served in flute glasses with mint leaf garnish and pink rim salt.

menu_items.name: Lassi Jaisi Koi Nahi
menu_items.description: A creamy, whipped yogurt lassi â€” lightly sweetened with honey and cardamom, perfect to cool the spice.
menu_items.plating: Mini glass jars topped with rose dust and pistachio shards.

menu_items.name: Chaas
menu_items.description: A light buttermilk drink with roasted cumin, ginger, and coriander â€” a savory refresher for every palate.
menu_items.plating: Served in frosted tumblers with curry leaf garnish.

menu_items.name: Shikanji (Desi Lemonade)
menu_items.description: A zesty lemonade with a pinch of black salt, cumin, and mint â€” sweet, tart, and perfectly balanced.
menu_items.plating: Tall glasses with lemon slices and mint sprigs.
